title: Parliament Live Updates: Oppn demands rollback of fuel price hike, seeks PM Modi’s statement in LS - The Indian Express
content:
1. Parliament Live Updates: Oppn demands rollback of fuel price hike, seeks PM Modi’s statement in LS  The Indian Express
  2. Fuel prices raised again; Opposition takes up issue in House  Times of India
  3. Petrol Price News | Petrol Price Hiked | Fuel Price | Diesel Price | Petrol Price Hike | CNN News18  CNN-News18
  4. Give account of Rs 26 lakh crore excise duty earned on petrol, diesel: Cong to govt  CNBCTV18
  5. Congress MP gives adjournment motion notice in LS to discuss rise in prices of essential drugs  ThePrint
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Budget Session 2022 India, Parliament LIVE Updates, 29 March: The Criminal Procedure (Identification) Bill, 2022 was introduced in the Lok Sabha Monday by Union Minister of State for Home Affairs Ajay Mishra Teni. The opposition raised objections over the Bill calling it "draconian".
